release_note: Fixed some minor issues.

Wallpaper mode is now available on iPhone 14 series. The guide image that shows the layout of lock screen items clocks widgets music players etc. has been renewed to match the new lock screen of iOS 16. It is displayed when you touch the edit image in wallpaper mode. Since Live Wallpaper is no longer supported on iOS 16 only still images can be saved when using wallpaper mode on iOS 16. Rounded corners of margin border types B and C have been changed from simple circular arcs to iOS unique beautiful curves that look smoother. The type B was adjusted to fit precisely the rounded corners of each message in Notification Center and the type C automatically fits precisely to the rounded display edges of iPhone models with Face ID. Changed the margin preset value on iOS 16 wallpaper mode. Especially Size 3 matched to the margin width of Notification Center. These value can be changed on the in app settings screen Gear icon . Not only Margins but also Border preset values can now be individually customized for all 4 sizes. You can change them on the in app settings screen. When the wallpaper mode is selected on the aspect ratio change screen the setting values for the top and bottom edges are now displayed. Fixed some other minor issues.
iOS 16 support. iOS 16 no longer supports animated wallpapers. Still images captured from videos can be set as wallpaper as before.
Fixed minor issues and improved performance.
Fixed minor issues and improved performance.
Supported for iOS15. Wallpaper mode is now available on the iPhone 13 series. Fixed some minor issues.
Added Frame Grab function. You can easily save one frame of a video as a still image photo just by tapping the camera icon. It also supports high quality 4K video and slow motion video.
Fixed some non fatal issues.
Fixed the issue that video files with incomplete embedded profiles such as generated by Snow app could not be saved correctly.
Supported iOS14.5. Fixed some minor issues.

Wallpaper mode is now supported with the iPhone 12 series. Tweaked wallpaper placement for the latest iOS version. Improved to correctly convert HDR videos to SDR quality. Fixed a issue that sometimes it was not possible to save in the correct color when saving. Fixed a issue at the first startup. Support for App Tracking Transparency. Other minor issues have been fixed.
Support for iOS14.

Fixed minor issues. Added the function to save even as a rectangle. It supports videos still images and Live Photos. Suported aspect ratios are: 16:9 3:2 4:3 5:4 1:1 4:5 3:4 2:3 9:16 and device specific wallpaper sizes. Improved the screen transition when still images are saved making it easier to operate when capturing still images repeatedly from a video.

Added the function to save even as a rectangle. It supports videos still images and Live Photos. Suported aspect ratios are: 16:9 3:2 4:3 5:4 1:1 4:5 3:4 2:3 9:16 and device specific wallpaper sizes. Improved the screen transition when still images are saved making it easier to operate when capturing multiple still images from a video.
Support for iPhone SE 2nd .

Live wallpapers can now be created on iPhone XR 11 11 Pro 11 Pro Max. Added Share as Video to the function picker that appears after tapping the check button. Use it when you want to share video to other apps without saving to album. Video files can now be loaded from the iOS Files app iOS13 and later only . You can find Files icon by tapping the album name displayed at the top of the video picker screen. Added new Type E border effect. It can be found at the color picker screen. This is an effect that blurs only the edges that are not touching the edge of the screen. The wallpaper mode has been expanded to allow more flexible layout. For example you can create a wallpaper that makes Face ID sensor housing notch inconspicuous or a wallpaper that places images in position that avoid the music player window on the lock screen. Background Margin Size Preset Value can be changed from the setting screen in this app. Many bug fixes and fine tuned wallpaper position for each device.

Version 2.0.2: Fixed small issues. Add an information for Marketing URL. Version 2.0.1: Stock of Reward type ads has increased and it has become possible to Free upgrade to Pro version stably. Fixed a small issue that occurred when importing video from other apps via Open in SquareadyV found in its Share menu. Version 2.0.0: While retaining the ease of use and familiarity of the past it has been redesigned to 2.0 by adding a number of useful new features such as still image capture from videos and creation of Live Wallpaper . UI design has been renewed. Supported the screen size for iPhone X XR XS XS Max. Paid in app purchase Ad Free has been renamed to Upgrade to Pro version . You can upgrade to the Pro version for free by watching the rewarded video. The main operation are corresponded to haptic feedback. work only the device with Taptic Engine It became possible to zoom in out by pinch operation. Long tap on or now auto fit to the vertical horizontal edge of the screen. The recommended save size is now automatically selected according to the zooming status. It is now possible to change the border color while fixing the TONE color. It is now possible to restore the previous edit state at app startup. Various other minor fixes have been made to improve operability and stability. The following are dedicated features of the Pro version both paid and free : Pro Live Wallpaper designing function on non 3D Touch devices will be still wallpaper Pro 3 types of wallpaper design modes are selectable such as Full screen Clock safe Pro New ideas to enable accurate wallpaper settings on iOS standard Photos app and Settings app. Pro Function to avoid enlargement during 3D touch with Lock screen Pro Live Photos support Load Save Pro Export a long time Live Photos more than 3 sec Pro Function to change key photo Pro Photo still picture capture from video Pro Stepless adjustment for background blur 0 to 50 Pro High resolution output 4K 2160p 1920p 1440p 1280p Pro Real time display of Save resolution while zooming

Version 2.0.1: Stock of Reward type ads has increased and it has become possible to Free upgrade to Pro version stably. Fixed a small issue that occurred when importing video from other apps via Open in SquareadyV found in its Share menu. While retaining the ease of use and familiarity of the past it has been redesigned to 2.0 by adding a number of useful new features such as still image capture from videos and creation of Live Wallpaper . UI design has been renewed. Supported the screen size for iPhone X XR XS XS Max. Paid in app purchase Ad Free has been renamed to Upgrade to Pro version . You can upgrade to the Pro version for free by watching the rewarded video. The main operation are corresponded to haptic feedback. work only the device with Taptic Engine It became possible to zoom in out by pinch operation. Long tap on or now auto fit to the vertical horizontal edge of the screen. The recommended save size is now automatically selected according to the zooming status. It is now possible to change the border color while fixing the TONE color. It is now possible to restore the previous edit state at app startup. Various other minor fixes have been made to improve operability and stability. The following are dedicated features of the Pro version both paid and free : Pro Live Wallpaper designing function on non 3D Touch devices will be still wallpaper Pro 3 types of wallpaper design modes are selectable such as Full screen Clock safe Pro New ideas to enable accurate wallpaper settings on iOS standard Photos app and Settings app. Pro Function to avoid enlargement during 3D touch with Lock screen Pro Live Photos support Load Save Pro Export a long time Live Photos more than 3 sec Pro Function to change key photo Pro Photo still picture capture from video Pro Stepless adjustment for background blur 0 to 50 Pro High resolution output 4K 2160p 1920p 1440p 1280p Pro Real time display of Save resolution while zooming

Improved stability and usability for File selector. Tap the center of the startup screen has been added as an operation to open File selector. Other numerous fine modifications have been made to improve operability and stability.
Updated to comply with EU General Data Protection Regulation GDPR . It affects only users in the European Economic Area EEA .
Support for slo mo videos. Fixed the saving process bug.

Support for iCloud Photo Library. Now possible to use Live Photos video part. Improved Thumbnails View. Duration time of Auto section has been changed to 60 seconds based on latest Instagram. Added 3 sec Exporting Function for shorter video.
Support for iOS9. Show the remaining time when saving. Conversion stability has been improved. Fixed some minor bugs.
Royalty free music. Blurred movie background. Easy colored tone filter. Fixed exporting bugs. Selectable exporting resolution. To post to Twitter please select 720x720.
Fixed issues for importing from other sound video related apps.
Added some types of compatible sound file for Soundtrack.
Fixed the issue of saving when using specific video file. ex.Snapchat Hyperlapse from Instagram etc.

New feature: Can add a sound from Music Library. Can import sounds from other music apps. Supporting method: Open in... iTunes file sharing and also AudioCopy via General Pasteboard . Support for importing video from other apps using Open in... method. When tap and hold Start or End button the duration time of the save section would be set to 15 seconds. Ads removable add on is now available.

Added Scroll function when zooming. Added Audio Mute function. Support for HD export on iOS7.0 or later Up to 1080p on selected devices . When exporting this version has been modified to take over the original framerate as much as possible. Added Double framerate exporting function Can be found iOS Settings app SquareadyV. Tuned the file picker design for iOS7. Removed the reload button on the file picker and added the Pull To Reload function instead. Added Video Information Display function for the devices with Retina display It can be found iOS Settings app SquareadyV. Fixed export issues.

Can now pick videos from all albums. Not only Camera Roll. Can now change the border and background color. Fixed some issues on saving videos. Increased points of the aspect ratio zoom and changed the UI to and button. Support for Trim. Now you can set Starting and Ending points for Trim. Savable duration has been increased to 0.5 seconds to 5 minutes. Display the timecode. min:sec:frame Precise frame search by scrubbing left and right on the video previewing area. Seek every 1 second by scrubbing the timeline gauge. Hashtag squareadyvideo will be copied to Clipbord when you launch Instagram app in Camera mode. Please use it in paste when write a comment.
